gemini_config.system_instruction: A modern apartment in Montenegro with a panoramic sea view. A bright, spacious living room with a calm, elegant interior. A mother and her son are sitting on the sofa, a blanket and soft cushions nearby, creating a feeling of warmth and closeness. There is a sense of quiet celebration in the air, with the New Year just around the corner and the home filled with comfort and a peaceful family atmosphere.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""A modern apartment in Montenegro with a panoramic sea view. A bright, spacious living room with a ca..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
